CustomField.description: It stores Sensitised Debt Service calculation.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( genesis__Product_Type__c , 'LINE OF CREDIT') ,( genesis__Credit_Limit__c/ genesis__CL_Product__r.genesis__LOC_Amort_Term__c )+( genesis__Credit_Limit__c*( (genesis__Interest_Rate__c + genesis__CL_Product__r.genesis__Added_Interest__c)/100 ) ) , 12*genesis__Payment_Amount__c )
CustomField.label: Sensitised Debt Service
